required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparative Study of Non-contact Tonometers for Intraocular Pressure and Corneal Cell Thickness Measurements
clinical_study.official_title: Comparative Study of the Topcon Tonometers - CT-800, CT-1, CT-1P and TRK-2P to Demonstrate Conformance to ANSI Z80.10-2009 Ophthalmic Instruments -Tonometers, to the FDA Guidance for Industry and FDA Staff, Tonometer-Premarket Notification [510(k)] Submissions, and to the Applicable Supplemental Information Sheet and Comparison of Pachymetry Values for CT-1P and TRK-2P With the Konan CellChek Plus (Predicate)

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this clinical study is to collect clinical data to support FDA 510(k) submissions for the Topcon CT-800, CT-1, CT-1P and TRK-2P non-contact tonometers. The secondary objective is to evaluate any adverse events found during the clinical study.

primary_outcome.measure: Agreement of intraocular pressure measurements from predicate vs. investigational device
Agreement of central corneal thickness measurements from predicate vs. investigational device

arm_group.arm_group_label: Male and female adults 18+ years of age
